dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Hey, I just found this mysterious box in the attic. Should I open it?

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: Hmm, I'm not sure. It could be dangerous. Is there anything written on the box?

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: Yes, it says 'Open only in case of emergency'. Shouldn't I check its contents?

dialogues.speaker: Friend
dialogues.text: Well, if it says so, maybe it's best to proceed with caution. Make sure you're prepared for any emergency.

dialogues.speaker: Player
dialogues.text: You're right. I'll get some gloves and safety goggles before opening it. Wish me luck!
